title: I CANT LOG IN TO AN ACC
body: Hey! so I have an old account that I used to use but I seem to have forgotten the username and password. So when I tried to recover it with my email, I realised that I don't remember what email I have for that account. Help! what do I do?

replies.body:
If you can remember the summoner name and enough account specific info/stuff from the account's creation you can submit an account recovery ticket to Player Support and they'll be able to help you out.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
